data.text: Tell everyone on the earth
They should sing songs that say that God [MTY] is very great,
They should say to God, â€œThe things that you do are awesome!
Everyone on the earth should worship God
Come and think about what God has done!
He caused the Red Sea to become dry land,
By his great power he rules forever,
You people of all nations, praise our God!
He has kept us alive,
God, you have tested us;
It is as if you allowed us to fall into traps [MET],
You allowed our enemies to trample on us;
Yahweh, I will bring to your temple offerings that are to be completely burned on the altar;
When I was experiencing much trouble, I said that I would bring offerings to you if you rescued me;
I will bring sheep to be burned on the altar,
All you people who revere God, come and listen,
I called out to him to help me,
If I had ignored the sins that I had committed,
But because I confessed my sins, God has listened to me
I praise God
